title: Radius Connect - News & Updates
description: Latest news and updates from Radius Connect - the privacy-first social discovery app and social media platform

items.title: Radius Connect App Launches - Social Discovery Reimagined
items.content_text: Radius Connect is now available on iOS and Android! Connect with people nearby, join group chatrooms, play the Guess Me game, chat with rich media, and help your community. Download now for free.
